definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: I can explain it best by something which Mahatma Gandhi said to me.
sentences.chinese: 聖雄甘地曾經過我說過的話可以幫助大家理解它。

sentences.english: Mohandas Gandhi was the twentieth century’s most famous advocate of nonviolent politics.
sentences.chinese: 聖雄甘地是二十世紀最有名的非暴力政治的倡導者。

sentences.english: The woman is obviously perplexed and musters up her courage, and says, "Mahatma, thank you very much.
sentences.chinese: 那個女人很困惑，她鼓起勇氣，說“聖雄，非常感謝。

sentences.english: An artist in the show had included a quotation from Mohandas Gandhi.
sentences.chinese: 在演出的藝術家包括了從聖雄甘地的報價。
